RawLine: DifficultyWarning2	<color=#FFE829>˙战斗数值调整</color>：己方单位的战力会<color=#ff2222>削弱</color>，而敌方单位的战力会<color=#ff2222>增强</color>。

Items.r: <color=#FFE829>˙战斗数值调整</color>：己方单位的战力会<color=#ff2222>削弱</color>，而敌方单位的战力会<color=#ff2222>增强</color>。
Items.c: ˙战斗数值调整：己方单位的战力会削弱,而敌方单位的战力会增强。
Items.it: Combat value adjustment: Self-unit's power will be weakened, while enemy unit's power will be increased.
